task_description:
Component Deduplication & Reusability Audit
Objective: Ensure all shared UI elements follow single-source-of-truth architecture—one change propagates everywhere.
Scope:

Sidebar component(s)
Middle pane / list views
Main pane / detail views
Any UI pattern appearing on 2+ pages

Actions:

Audit — Scan the codebase for duplicate or near-duplicate component code across pages. Flag anything that's copy-pasted rather than imported.
Extract — Refactor duplicated elements into shared components in /components/shared/ (or equivalent). This includes:

Component files
Design tokens (colors, spacing, typography)
Shared CSS/styles


Replace — Update all instances to import from the single source. Remove orphaned duplicate code.
Verify — Confirm that modifying the shared component updates every usage across the app.

Deliverable: A codebase where layout shells (sidebar, panes) and repeated UI patterns exist in exactly one place.
